name: Jitendra-02.GitHub.io
body:
![jitendra](https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/5539110?v=3&s=460)I am a Computer Science Engineering Student of Rajiv Gandhi Technical University Bhopal. I am technology lover and generally fun with kernel hacking just a hobby nothing much more than it. I always find pursuite of happiness into the science of kernel. I am great follower of Linux community. Sometimes I love to do some socialism with technology.
***


Till Now I am:
### NEKTech Shell Development
In this project I have developed, 2 features of nektech shell (An Educational Purpose shell).I worked on gcc,gdb,cscope, and most favorite vi editor.
***

### System Identification Utility
This is the utility which keep track record of client system.
eg. no of authorized system, no of unauthorized system, no of active system etc
***

### ATM Survellience 
It is proactive security system for the ATM, in sensor observ the activity of the person inside the ATM an take action accordingly. This project is National Microsoft Imagine Cup 1 winner :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
